applicationaccessall.name: ApplicationAccessAll
applicationaccessall.description: Grants permission to access OpenSearch Application

cancelautooptimizejob.name: CancelAutoOptimizeJob
cancelautooptimizejob.description: Grants permission to cancel submitted Auto Optimize Job

canceldirectquery.name: CancelDirectQuery
canceldirectquery.description: Grants permission to cancel the query that is submitted on the OpenSearch DataSource resource

deleteautooptimizejob.name: DeleteAutoOptimizeJob
deleteautooptimizejob.description: Grants permission to delete Auto Optimize Job

getautooptimizejob.name: GetAutoOptimizeJob
getautooptimizejob.description: Grants permission to get the Auto Optimize Job details

getdirectquery.name: GetDirectQuery
getdirectquery.description: Grants permission to get the query status that are performed on the OpenSearch DataSource resource

getdirectqueryresult.name: GetDirectQueryResult
getdirectqueryresult.description: Grants permission to get the results of a query that is performed on the OpenSearch DataSource resource

listautooptimizejobs.name: ListAutoOptimizeJobs
listautooptimizejobs.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of Auto Optimize Jobs

startdirectquery.name: StartDirectQuery
startdirectquery.description: Grants permission to start a direct query on the provided OpenSearch DataSource arns

submitautooptimizejob.name: SubmitAutoOptimizeJob
submitautooptimizejob.description: Grants permission to create new Auto Optimize Job
